verses.verse: Now these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>, Shem <S%H8035><s%>, Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Japheth <S%H3315><s%>: and unto them were sons <S%H1121><s%> born <S%H3205><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japheth <S%H3315><s%>; Gomer <S%H1586><s%>, and Magog <S%H4031><s%>, and Madai <S%H4074><s%>, and Javan <S%H3120><s%>, and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>, and Meshech <S%H4902><s%>, and Tiras <S%H8494><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gomer <S%H1586><s%>; Ashkenaz <S%H813><s%>, and Riphath <S%H7384><s%>, and Togarmah <S%H8425><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Javan <S%H3120><s%>; Elishah <S%H473><s%>, and Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>, Kittim <S%H3794><s%>, and Dodanim <S%H1721><s%>.

By these were the isles <S%H339><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> divided in <S%H6504><s%> their lands <S%H776><s%>; every one <S%H376><s%> after his tongue <S%H3956><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, in their nations <S%H1471><s%>.
¶ And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>; Cush <S%H3568><s%>, and Mizraim <S%H4714><s%>, and Phut <S%H6316><s%>, and Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%>; Seba <S%H5434><s%>, and Havilah <S%H2341><s%>, and Sabtah <S%H5454><s%>, and Raamah <S%H7484><s%>, and Sabtecha <S%H5455><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Raamah <S%H7484><s%>; Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>.
And Cush <S%H3568><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Nimrod <S%H5248><s%>: he began <S%H2490><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> a mighty one <S%H1368><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

He was a mighty <S%H1368><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: wherefore <S%H3651><s%> it is said <S%H559><s%>, Even as Nimrod <S%H5248><s%> the mighty <S%H1368><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his kingdom <S%H4467><s%> was Babel <S%H894><s%>, and Erech <S%H751><s%>, and Accad <S%H390><s%>, and Calneh <S%H3641><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%>.

Out of that land <S%H776><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> Asshur <S%H804><s%>, and builded <S%H1129><s%> Nineveh <S%H5210><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%>, and Calah <S%H3625><s%>,
And Resen <S%H7449><s%> between Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> and Calah <S%H3625><s%>: the same is a great <S%H1419><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>.
And Mizraim <S%H4714><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ludim <S%H3866><s%>, and Anamim <S%H6047><s%>, and Lehabim <S%H3853><s%>, and Naphtuhim <S%H5320><s%>,
And Pathrusim <S%H6625><s%>, and Casluhim <S%H3695><s%>, (out of whom came <S%H3318><s%> Philistim <S%H6430><s%>,) and Caphtorim <S%H3732><s%>.
¶ And Canaan <S%H3667><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Sidon <S%H6721><s%> his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and Heth <S%H2845><s%>,
And the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Girgasite <S%H1622><s%>,
And the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Arkite <S%H6208><s%>, and the Sinite <S%H5513><s%>,

And the Arvadite <S%H721><s%>, and the Zemarite <S%H6786><s%>, and the Hamathite <S%H2577><s%>: and afterward <S%H310><s%> were the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> spread abroad <S%H6327><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> was from Sidon <S%H6721><s%>, as thou comest <S%H935><s%> to Gerar <S%H1642><s%>, unto Gaza <S%H5804><s%>; as thou goest <S%H935><s%>, unto Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, and Admah <S%H126><s%>, and Zeboim <S%H6636><s%>, even unto Lasha <S%H3962><s%>.
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, after their tongues <S%H3956><s%>, in their countries <S%H776><s%>, and in their nations <S%H1471><s%>.

¶ Unto Shem <S%H8035><s%> also, the father <S%H1><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Eber <S%H5677><s%>, the brother <S%H251><s%> of Japheth <S%H3315><s%> the elder <S%H1419><s%>, even to him were children born <S%H3205><s%>.
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>; Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and Asshur <S%H804><s%>, and Arphaxad <S%H775><s%>, and Lud <S%H3865><s%>, and Aram <S%H758><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aram <S%H758><s%>; Uz <S%H5780><s%>, and Hul <S%H2343><s%>, and Gether <S%H1666><s%>, and Mash <S%H4851><s%>.
And Arphaxad <S%H775><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Salah <S%H7974><s%>; and Salah <S%H7974><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Eber <S%H5677><s%>.

And unto Eber <S%H5677><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> was Peleg <S%H6389><s%>; for in his days <S%H3117><s%> was the earth <S%H776><s%> divided <S%H6385><s%>; and his brother's <S%H251><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Joktan <S%H3355><s%>.
And Joktan <S%H3355><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Almodad <S%H486><s%>, and Sheleph <S%H8026><s%>, and Hazarmaveth <S%H2700><s%>, and Jerah <S%H3392><s%>,
And Hadoram <S%H1913><s%>, and Uzal <S%H187><s%>, and Diklah <S%H1853><s%>,
And Obal <S%H5745><s%>, and Abimael <S%H39><s%>, and Sheba <S%H7614><s%>,
And Ophir <S%H211><s%>, and Havilah <S%H2341><s%>, and Jobab <S%H3103><s%>: all these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joktan <S%H3355><s%>.
And their dwelling <S%H4186><s%> was from Mesha <S%H4852><s%>, as thou goest <S%H935><s%> unto Sephar <S%H5611><s%> a mount <S%H2022><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>.
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, after their tongues <S%H3956><s%>, in their lands <S%H776><s%>, after their nations <S%H1471><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>, after their generations <S%H8435><s%>, in their nations <S%H1471><s%>: and by these were the nations <S%H1471><s%> divided <S%H6504><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%>.
